}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *UGREEN USB-C to RJ45 2.5G Adapter • Model: CM648 • P/N: 25052 :[[Realtek]] RTL8156BG / [https://www.realtek.com/en/products/connected-media-ics/item/rtl8156b-s-g-cg RTL8156BG]
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.servethehome.com/ugreen-usb-type-c-to-2-5gbe-cheap-network-adapter-review/ ''UGREEN USB Type-C to 2.5GbE Cheap Network Adapter Review'' on '''ServeTheHome'''] *[https://github.com/bb-qq/r8152 ''DSM Driver for Realtek RTL8152/RTL8153/RTL8156 based USB Ethernet Adapters'']
:;Supported Realtek RTL8156 (2.5Gbps) based devices: *[[ASUS USB-C2500]] (RTL8156B/Type-A) *[[ASUSTOR AS-U2.5G]] (RTL8156/Type-C to A) *[[ASUSTOR AS-U2.5G2]] (RTL8156B/Type-C to A) *[[Anker USB C to 2.5Gbps Ethernet Adapter]] (RTL8156/Type-C) *[[biaze KZ13]] (Type-A, only in China) *[[Buffalo LUA-U3-A2G]] (RTL8156/Type-A, only in Japan) *[[CableCreation 2.5G Ethernet Adapter]] (RTL8156/Type-A) *[[CLUB 3D CAC-1420]] (RTL8156/Type-A) *[[Plannex USB-LAN2500R]] (RTL8156/Type-A, only in Japan) *[[Plannex USB-LAN2500R2]] (RTL8156BG/Type-A, only in Japan) *[[StarTech US2GC30]] (RTL8156BG/Type-C) *[[TRENDnet TUC-ET2G]] (RTL8156 (v1.0)/RTL8156BG (v2.0)/Type-C) *[[UGREEN CM275 (70446)]] (RTL8156/Type-C) • [https://www.servethehome.com/ugreen-usb-type-c-to-2-5gbe-cheap-network-adapter-review/ Review] :UGREEN USB C to 2.5G Ethernet Adapter (2019) (RTL8156/Type-C) V30.00 :%RTL8156.DeviceDesc% = RTL8156x64.ndi,USB\VID_0BDA&PID_8156&REV_3000 :UGREEN USB C to Ethernet Adapter 2.5G (2023) (RTL8156BG/Type-C) V31.00 *[[UGREEN CM648 (25052)]] (RTL8156BG/Type-C) :%RTL8156.DeviceDesc% = RTL8156Bx64.ndi,USB\VID_0BDA&PID_8156&REV_3100
Note: Products using RTL8156BG have dramatically lower power consumption :(up to 64% decrease) and heat generation than those using RTL8156.
==See also== *[[ASUS USB-C2500]] • [[Realtek]] [https://www.realtek.com/en/products/connected-media-ics/item/rtl8156b-s-g-cg RTL8156B] *[[Ankmax UC312G2]] • Realtek RTL8156B *[[Plugable USBC-E2500]] • Realtek RTL8156B *[[Sabrent NT-S25G]] • Realtek RTL8156B *[[UNITEK U1313A]] • Realtek RTL8156B *[[UNITEK U1313B]] • Realtek RTL8156B
*[[TP-LINK TL-UE300]] • Realtek RTL8153 *[[TP-LINK TL-UG310]] • Realtek RTL8153
